definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: box-tree (on form cf. Sta:§ 267) Is 41:19, Is 60:13, Ez Eze 27:6 (cf. supr.) a small evergreen tree about 20 feet high, growing on Lebanon, Bo Tristr:Nat. Hist. Bib 339, so Vulgate Targum RV. (Others sherbîn, a species of cedar distinguished by the smallness of its cones and the upward direction of its branches, cf. Thes RobGes.)
